line.token: * @description: This is a page that shows the cart content,
* without "leading to" checking out. That is, there is no "next step" functionality
* or a way to submit the order.
* NOTE: both the Account and the Checkout Page extend from this class as they
'you must log in to view this order'

'

You do not have any items in your current order.

'

'

Sorry, the order you are trying to open does not exist.

'
"A page where the customer can view the current order (cart) without finalising the order."
* override core function to turn "checkout" into "Checkout (1)"
* Standard SS function, we only allow for one CartPage page to exist
* but we do allow for extensions to exist at the same time.
'Label on link to continue shopping - e.g. click here to continue shopping'
'Label on link to proceed to checkout - e.g. click here to finalise your order'
'Label on the link \'view account details\' - e.g. click here to view your account details'
'Label for the link pointing to the current order - e.g. click here to view current order'
'Label for the link pointing to the order which requires a log in - e.g. you must login to view this order'
'Label for the saving an order - e.g. click here to save current order'
'Label for the loading an order into the cart - e.g. click here to finalise this order'
'Label for the deleting an order - e.g. click here to delete this order'
'No items in order - shown when the customer tries to view an order without items.'
'Non-existing Order - shown when the customer tries to load a non-existing order.'
